name: d3-bar
description: Simple d3 plugin that will handle common use case bar charts

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_bar -o build/d3-bar.js -g d3-array:d3_array,d3-collection:d3_collection,d3-interpolate:d3_interpolate,d3-format:d3_format,d3-time:d3_time,d3-time-format:d3_time_format,d3-color:d3_color -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-bar.js -c -m -o build/d3-bar.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-bar.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-bar.js build/d3-bar.min.js
